body:
Ocaml is `class Ocaml(AutotoolsPackage):`

When I try to build it, using the devel branch of a clone from 20160131, it dies with the following message in the `spack-build.out` file:

```
==> '/isilon/Analysis/scratch/hartzelg/spack/spack-20170131/var/spack/stage/ocaml-4.03.0-ktkzdjwhbav3td6aqi3zeufdhs4g2is3/ocaml-4.03.0/configure' '--prefix=/isilon/Analysis/scratch/hartzelg/spack/spack-20170131/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/ocaml-4.03.0-ktkzdjwhbav3td6aqi3zeufdhs4g2is3'
Configuring OCaml version 4.03.0
[ERROR!] configure expects arguments of the form '-prefix /foo/bar', not '-prefix=/foo/bar' (note the '=').
```

Before I dig in, does this ring any bells?
title: Ocaml fails to build, AutotoolsPackage issue?
